short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Bring the radiant charm of blooming sunflowers

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension brings a burst of sunshine to your screen, blending the warmth of nature with the tranquility of open skies. Perfect for brightening your day and adding a touch of optimism to your tabs.

Key features:
- Beautiful background.
- Quick access to frequently visited sites.
- Real-time weather display and clock.
